channel.title: Sunset Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Sunset Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-26 East Offramp at OR-8
item.description: US-26 east offramp at OR-8 split. Use left lane for OR-8 for Canyon Road and West Slope. Use right lane for US-26 West/Beaverton/Hillsboro.

item.title: US-26 West - Exit 71A
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 71A - OR-8/Canyon Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Exits 71B and 71A
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 71B - Sylvan. Approaching Exit 71A - OR-8/Canyon Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Beaverton Exits and Exits 71AB
item.description: US-26 West approaching Exit 71B - Sylvan. Truck traffic, including Exit 71A bound truck traffic, need to use the right truck lane. Also a sign on the bridge lists the Beaverton Exits - Canyon Road, ORE Hwy. 217, and Cedar Hills Road.

item.title: US-26 West - Exit 72
item.description: US-26 west at Exit 72 - Zoo/Forestry Center. Access to the Portland Zoo and Washington Park.

item.title: Offramp for I-405 North to US-26 at 12th Ave.
item.description: Offramp from I-405 to US-26 west at 12th Ave. interchange. Stay in left lanes for US-26 West/Ocean Beaches/Beaverton. Speed limit is 50 MPH. This speed limit sign is one of the newer style speed limit signs seen on Oregon freeways, with the word LIMIT included.

item.title: I-405 North - Exits 1D and 2A
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 1D - US-26 West/Beaverton. Approaching Exit 2A - Salmon St./JELD-WEN Field. Also a sign for the next two exits on I-405 North - Everett St./Glisan St. and US-30 West.

item.title: I-405 North - Exit 1D
item.description: I-405 north at Exit 1D - US-26 West/Beaverton.

item.title: Glencoe Rd. N. at US-26 Exit 57 Onramp
item.description: Glencoe Road north at US-26 (Exit 57) West to Ocean Beaches.

item.title: Glencoe Rd. S. at US-26 Exit 57 Onramp
item.description: Glencoe Road south at US-26 (Exit 57) West to Ocean Beaches and east to Portland.

item.title: US-101 North at US-26 East
item.description: US-101 north to Seaside and Astoria at US-26 west to Portland.

item.title: US-101 South at US-26
item.description: US-101 south to Cannon Beach and Tillamook, and US-26 East to Portland. This is the western end of US-26.

item.title: US-101 South at US-26
item.description: US-101 south approaching western end of US-26.

item.title: US-26 East - Hillsboro Exits
item.description: Distance marker overhead on US-26 east, Hillsboro Exits: Corneilus Pass Road/NW 185th Ave.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching I-405
item.description: US-26 east approaching I-405. US-26 east follows I-405 south towards The Dalles and Salem.

item.title: US-26 East at I-405
item.description: US-26 east approaching I-405 and Market St. into Downtown Portland.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 55
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 55, Dersham Road/Mountaindale.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 57
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 57, Glencoe Road/North Plains, 1 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 59
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 59, Jackson School Road.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 61
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 61, Helvetia Road/Shute Road, 1 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 62
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 62, Corneilus Pass/West Union, 3/4 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 64
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 64, 185th Ave./PCC - Rock Creek.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 65
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 65, Bethany Blvd./Cornell Road.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 67
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 67, Murray Blvd.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 68
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 68, Cedar Hills Blvd./Beaverton, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 71
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 71, Sylvan, 1/2 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 72
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 72, Zoo/Forestry Center.

item.title: US-26 East Exit 73
item.description: US-26 east approaching Exit 73, Canyon Road/PGE Park, 1 mile.

item.title: US-26 East Exits 69AB
item.description: US-26 east at Exit 69A - OR-217 South/Tigard/Salem. Approaching Exit 68B - Park Way/Barnes Road.
